name: css-animation-play-state
description: Css module of single purpose classes for animation play state

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-animation-play-state.css > css/css-animation-play-state.css && tachyons src/css-animation-play-state.css --minify > css/css-animation-play-state.min.css && tachyons src/css-animation-play-state.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
